pages.text_verbatim_title_block:
NEW RESIDENTIAL ACCESSORY BUILDING FOR DAVE & CORY MATTHEWS
AREA CALCULATIONS
AREA SQ.FT.
FOUNDATION FOOTPRINT 720
MAIN FLOOR 720
LOFT FLOOR 570
INDEX OF DRAWINGS
DRAWING PAGE No.
COVER SHEET/EFFICIENCY SUMMARY A01
CONCRETE SLAB PLAN A1
CMU WALL PLAN A2
MAIN FLOOR PLAN A3
LOFT PLAN A4
ROOF PLAN A5
FRONT & REAR ELEVATIONS A6
LEFT & RIGHT ELEVATIONS A7
BUILDING SECTION A8
BENCHMARK
BCRN: 129775 & 103800
Project: 25-01-040
Prepared: 2023-01-11
Barrie, Ontario
RES ACC BLDG
DRAWING BY: PO
SCALE: 1/8" = 1'-0"
DATE: January 11, 2023
PHASE
A.01
COVER
pages.general_notes_verbatim:
GENERAL CONSTRUCTION NOTES:
1. All work shall conform to the latest edition of the Ontario Building Code.
2. Contractor to verify all dimensions before construction.
3. Contractor shall ensure all work is in compliance with local bylaws.
4. All fasteners in contact with treated wood shall be ACQ rated.
5. All construction to be in accordance with the Ontario Building Code latest edition.
6. Contractor to ensure all work is carried out in accordance with the latest edition of the Ontario Building Code and local bylaws.
FOUNDATION NOTES:
1. Foundation to be constructed as per structural drawings.
2. All footings to be placed on undisturbed soil or compacted granular fill.
3. Foundation walls to be reinforced as per structural drawings.
FRAMING NOTES:
1. All framing to be carried out in accordance with structural drawings.
2. All framing members to be installed as per manufacturer's specifications.
3. All framing to be inspected by local building department prior to covering.
pages.page_overview_summary: This cover sheet provides an overview of the new residential accessory building project for Dave & Cory Matthews. It includes general construction, foundation, and framing notes, as well as area calculations and an index of drawings. The sheet outlines the project's compliance with the Ontario Building Code and local bylaws. Key components include general construction notes, foundation notes, and framing notes, which guide the overall construction process.

pages.text_verbatim_title_block:
BENCHMARK
BCRN: 129775 & 103800
Project: 25-01-040

Barrie, Ontario
RES ACC BLDG
DRAWING BY: PO
SCALE: 1/4" = 1'-0"
DATE: January 11, 2023
PHASE
A1
SLAB PLAN
pages.general_notes_verbatim:
GENERAL NOTES:
FOUNDATIONS:
1. Remove all topsoil and organic material from the building area.
2. Slab to be placed on 6" compacted granular fill.
3. All concrete work shall be carried out in accordance with the latest edition of the Ontario Building Code.
4. Slab edge to be thickened as per detail D1.
5. Slab is not to be poured on frozen ground.
pages.page_overview_summary: This sheet presents the floating slab plan for the foundation level of the residential accessory building. It includes detailed notes on foundation preparation, concrete specifications, and slab edge detailing. The plan specifies the removal of topsoil, the use of compacted granular fill, and adherence to the Ontario Building Code. The slab edge is to be thickened as shown in detail D1, ensuring structural stability.

pages.general_notes_verbatim:
CMU PLAN NOTES:
1. All fasteners in contact with treated wood shall be ACQ rated.
pages.page_overview_summary: This sheet details the CMU (Concrete Masonry Unit) wall plan for the foundation level. It includes specifications for floor and wall assemblies, emphasizing the use of ACQ-rated fasteners for treated wood. The plan outlines the layout and construction of CMU walls, ensuring compliance with structural requirements and providing a stable foundation for the building.

MAIN FLOOR PLAN
pages.general_notes_verbatim:
MAIN FLOOR PLAN NOTES:
1. All fasteners into treated wood shall be ACQ rated.
2. All interior walls are 1/2" unless otherwise noted.
pages.page_overview_summary: This sheet provides the main floor plan for the residential accessory building, detailing the layout and structural components. It includes floor and wall assemblies, as well as lintel and column schedules. The plan specifies the use of ACQ-rated fasteners for treated wood and outlines the dimensions and materials for interior walls. This ensures a robust and compliant ground floor structure.

pages.general_notes_verbatim:

1. All fasteners into treated wood shall be ACQ rated.

pages.page_overview_summary: This sheet illustrates the loft plan, showing the layout and structural details for the loft level of the building. It includes floor and wall assemblies, as well as a lintel schedule. The plan emphasizes the use of ACQ-rated fasteners and specifies materials for interior walls, ensuring structural integrity and compliance with building codes.

A5
ROOF PLAN
pages.general_notes_verbatim:
ROOF PLAN NOTES:
1. Maintain 10" truss heel for insulation and roof venting.
2. Provide vented soffits and 1 1/2" venting between sheathing and insulation.
3. Provide 24" eave, 24" gable finished overhangs unless noted otherwise.
pages.page_overview_summary: This sheet presents the roof plan, detailing the layout and structural components of the roof. It includes roof and ceiling assemblies, specifying truss heels, venting, and overhangs. The plan ensures proper insulation and ventilation, contributing to the building's energy efficiency and structural integrity.
